{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Phicomm |model=K2 |revision=P (B1) |asin= |series=AC1200 |est_release_date=06/2017 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=YJYK2PB |pcb_id=800002354 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM47189B0;BCM47189B0KRFBG; |cpu1_cspeed=900 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q127CSIG |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W631GG6KB-12 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pad header,, J1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM47189B0;BCM47189B0KRFBG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43217;BCM43217KMLG; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53125S;BCM53125SKMMLG; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier;Richwave;RTC5641EX;067, 41EX, 1721;2; ,,, 5GHz RF Front End Module;Qorvo;QPF4519;Q, QPF4519, 5DVB;2; |flags= |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=PHICOMM_XX, PHICOMM_XX_5G |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=D8:C8:E9 |oui_eth=D8:C8:E9 }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256-QAM) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router}} :[http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/122.html Product page] "800002354" and "V1.5" is silkscreened on the [http://www.acwifi.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/SAM_2597.jpg main board]. ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM47189 @900MHz WiSoC (ARM Cortex-A7) *Wireless Chipset: [[Broadcom]] BCM43217 (2T2R 802.11bgn) *Wireless Standard: 802.11bgn (2.4GHz), 802.11an/ac (5GHz) *Wireless Speed: 300Mbps for 2.4GHz, 867Mbps for 5GHz ===Hardware Version=== *K2P (A1) • CPU: MT7621A @880MHz (Dual Core MIPS 1004Kc) *K2P (A2) • CPU: MT7621A @880MHz (Dual Core MIPS 1004Kc) *K2P (B1) • CPU: BCM47189 @900MHz (Single Core ARM CA7) *K2P (B2) • CPU: BCM47189 @900MHz (Single Core ARM CA7) ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.acwifi.net/3238.html ''Phicomm K2P B1'' on '''AC|WiFi.net'''] ([http://www.acwifi.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/all-1080x720.jpg PCB image]) *[http://www.acwifi.net/3261.html ''Phicomm K2P A1/B1'' on '''AC|WiFi.net'''] ([http://www.acwifi.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/k2P-and-k2P-BCM-1.jpg PCB image]) *[http://www.acwifi.net/2131.html ''Phicomm K2P A1'' on '''AC|WiFi.net'''] ([http://www.acwifi.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/k2p-chipe.jpg PCB image]) *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-107892-1-1.html ''Phicomm K2P A1'' on '''KoolShare''' forums] ([http://koolshare.cn/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=107892&aid=159621&from=album&page=1 PCB images]) *[https://forum.lede-project.org/t/when-does-the-lede-support-the-phicomm-k2p/4889 ''Phicomm K2P A1'' on '''LEDE''' forums] ([http://lists.infradead.org/pipermail/lede-commits/2017-July/004365.html LEDE support]) *[http://www.right.com.cn/forum/thread-216935-1-1.html ''Phicomm K2P A1'' on '''right.com''' forums] ===See also=== *[[Phicomm K3]] - AC3150 Smart Wi-Fi Router (2167+1000Mbps) • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/121.html PPage] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4709 @1.4GHz (Cortex A9), RAM: 512MB :3.5" TFT LCD Display, "800002240" V1.0 PCB (4T4R PA/LNA) *[[Phicomm K3C A1|Phicomm K3C]] -
